Fires six shooting stars that pursue foes
Unlocked by Conspectus Scroll
Name: Star Shower
Effect: Fires six shooting stars that pursue foes
How to get: Unlocked by Conspectus Scroll
Comet
Fires a great magic comet
In Raya Lucaria. From the Debate Parlor Grace, go back to the area before the boss room. Roll into the bookshelf with no books to find an Illusory Wall where the spell can be found.
Name: Comet
Effect: Fires a great magic comet
How to get: In Raya Lucaria. From the Debate Parlor Grace, go back to the area before the boss room. Roll into the bookshelf with no books to find an Illusory Wall where the spell can be found.
Shattering Crystal
Creates crystal mass that shatters in forward burst
From the Debate Parlor Grace in Raya Lucaria, go outside and turn right. Hop down then climb the ladder to get to the roof. Make your way to the Church of the Cuckoo on the North-West side and it will there.
Name: Shattering Crystal
Effect: Creates crystal mass that shatters in forward burst
How to get: From the Debate Parlor Grace in Raya Lucaria, go outside and turn right. Hop down then climb the ladder to get to the roof. Make your way to the Church of the Cuckoo on the North-West side and it will there.
Rennala's Full Moon
Incarnate a full moon and launch it at foes
Gotten from Rennala's Remembrance which is obtained by killing the boss of Raya Lucaria.
Name: Rennala's Full Moon
Effect: Incarnate a full moon and launch it at foes
How to get: Gotten from Rennala's Remembrance which is obtained by killing the boss of Raya Lucaria.
Oracle Bubbles
Launches several small magic bubbles
Go into the underground area via the lift at Siofra River Well in Limgrave's forest. From the Grace there, go through the ruins nearby and then turn around at the end and hop on top of them. Work your way over to the other side to where the scarab is. Kill the beetle for the spell
Name: Oracle Bubbles
Effect: Launches several small magic bubbles
How to get: Go into the underground area via the lift at Siofra River Well in Limgrave's forest. From the Grace there, go through the ruins nearby and then turn around at the end and hop on top of them. Work your way over to the other side to where the scarab is. Kill the beetle for the spell
Great Oracular Bubble
Launches a large magic bubble
Go into the underground area via the lift at Siofra River Well in Limgrave's forest. Go through the area to the next lift then take it to the next area. In the North-East section of this area is the Worshipper's Woods Grace. Go South from the Grace and use Matrix skills to dodge Radahn's Archery Instructors. Find a fallen pillar and hop on top of it then climb to the top to find a Waygate. Enter the nearby room full of enemies for a scarab. Beat it to death for putting you through all that for the spell.
Name: Great Oracular Bubble
Effect: Launches a large magic bubble
How to get: Go into the underground area via the lift at Siofra River Well in Limgrave's forest. Go through the area to the next lift then take it to the next area. In the North-East section of this area is the Worshipper's Woods Grace. Go South from the Grace and use Matrix skills to dodge Radahn's Archery Instructors. Find a fallen pillar and hop on top of it then climb to the top to find a Waygate. Enter the nearby room full of enemies for a scarab. Beat it to death for putting you through all that for the spell.
Rock Sling
Summons rocks from the earth and sends it flying
Under the North section of Street of Sages Ruins in the West part of the swamp.
Name: Rock Sling
Effect: Summons rocks from the earth and sends it flying
How to get: Under the North section of Street of Sages Ruins in the West part of the swamp.
Rock Blaster
Thrust staff into ground to emit a massive shockwave
In a chest in the upper level of Sellia Crystal Tunnel located North of the swamp. Easily gotten to from the teleport chest under the ruins in the South part of the lake in Limgrave.
Name: Rock Blaster
Effect: Thrust staff into ground to emit a massive shockwave
How to get: In a chest in the upper level of Sellia Crystal Tunnel located North of the swamp. Easily gotten to from the teleport chest under the ruins in the South part of the lake in Limgrave.
Night Comet
Fires semi-invisible magic comet
One of the chests in Sellia that are available after unlocking the seals by lighting the towers.
Name: Night Comet
Effect: Fires semi-invisible magic comet
How to get: One of the chests in Sellia that are available after unlocking the seals by lighting the towers.
Crystal Torrent
Creates crystal mass that fires stream of crystal shards
Kill the Boss of Sellia Hideaway. To find the hideaway, go to Sellia in the North-East part of the swamp. Go past the seals by lighting the fires at the tops of the towers. Go up the path to the Church of Plague. Go North of the Church to find the mage enemy and a giant gravestone. Roll into the cliff behind the Grave to break the Illusion and find the Hideaway.
Name: Crystal Torrent
Effect: Creates crystal mass that fires stream of crystal shards
How to get: Kill the Boss of Sellia Hideaway. To find the hideaway, go to Sellia in the North-East part of the swamp. Go past the seals by lighting the fires at the tops of the towers. Go up the path to the Church of Plague. Go North of the Church to find the mage enemy and a giant gravestone. Roll into the cliff behind the Grave to break the Illusion and find the Hideaway.
Eternal Darkness
Creates dark space that draws in spells
Go South from the Church of the Plague(explained just above) and cross the top of the gate nearby then go into the Swamp Lookout Tower to find the spell.
Name: Eternal Darkness
Effect: Creates dark space that draws in spells
How to get: Go South from the Church of the Plague(explained just above) and cross the top of the gate nearby then go into the Swamp Lookout Tower to find the spell.
Night Maiden's Mist
Releases life-sapping silver mist before caster
Sold by Gowry in Gowry's Shack south of Sellia after finishing his request.
Name: Night Maiden's Mist
Effect: Releases life-sapping silver mist before caster
How to get: Sold by Gowry in Gowry's Shack south of Sellia after finishing his request.
Night Shard
Swiftly fires semi-invisible magic projectile
Sold by Gowry
Name: Night Shard
Effect: Swiftly fires semi-invisible magic projectile
How to get: Sold by Gowry
Collapsing Stars
Pulls foes toward caster with gravity projectile volley
In a chest in the War-Dead Catacombs. The catacombs can be accessed after killing Radahn and are located in the North-East corner of his boss arena. The chest is on the lower levels, below all the fighting enemies.
Name: Collapsing Stars
Effect: Pulls foes toward caster with gravity projectile volley
How to get: In a chest in the War-Dead Catacombs. The catacombs can be accessed after killing Radahn and are located in the North-East corner of his boss arena. The chest is on the lower levels, below all the fighting enemies.
Stars of Ruin
Fires twelve dark shooting stars that pursue foes
Requires you to have found the Comet Azur. After finding the Comet Azur, go to Sellen in the basement of Waypoint Ruins, East of where the game started. Talk to her about the Comet Azur and she will give you a key. After get the key, head to Sellian Hideaway in North Caelid past the seals in Sellia and North of the Church of the Plague Grace. It is hidden behind an Illusory wall behind a giant gravestone. Go through Sellia Hideaway and at the bottom you will find a seal guarded by a sorceror. Kill him and open the seal then talk to Master Lusat for the Sorcery.
Name: Stars of Ruin
Effect: Fires twelve dark shooting stars that pursue foes
How to get: Requires you to have found the Comet Azur. After finding the Comet Azur, go to Sellen in the basement of Waypoint Ruins, East of where the game started. Talk to her about the Comet Azur and she will give you a key. After get the key, head to Sellian Hideaway in North Caelid past the seals in Sellia and North of the Church of the Plague Grace. It is hidden behind an Illusory wall behind a giant gravestone. Go through Sellia Hideaway and at the bottom you will find a seal guarded by a sorceror. Kill him and open the seal then talk to Master Lusat for the Sorcery.
Magma Shot
Fires lump of magma that explodes on contact
Reward from Volcano Manor's first request.
Name: Magma Shot
Effect: Fires lump of magma that explodes on contact
How to get: Reward from Volcano Manor's first request.
Tibia's Summons
Summons Those Lost in Death
After killing the boss of the "Coward's Path" aka Ruin-Strewn Precipice, take the path going North and get to the Wyndham Ruins. Kill the Tibia Mariner for the spell.
Name: Tibia's Summons
Effect: Summons Those Lost in Death
How to get: After killing the boss of the "Coward's Path" aka Ruin-Strewn Precipice, take the path going North and get to the Wyndham Ruins. Kill the Tibia Mariner for the spell.
Roiling Magma
Fires lump of magma that explodes after delay
In the Hermit's Shack South of Volcano Manor. Requires going around the North side of the zone to reach South of the Manor.
Name: Roiling Magma
Effect: Fires lump of magma that explodes after delay
How to get: In the Hermit's Shack South of Volcano Manor. Requires going around the North side of the zone to reach South of the Manor.
Comet Azur
Fires a tremendous comet within a starry torrent
Found on the Primeval Sorcery Azur located just North of Hermit Village, South-East of Volcano Manor. He will be lying on the ground and has a crystal head. Talk to him for the Sorcery. Note: This Sorcery is needed for Sorceress Sellen's Questline.
Name: Comet Azur
Effect: Fires a tremendous comet within a starry torrent
How to get: Found on the Primeval Sorcery Azur located just North of Hermit Village, South-East of Volcano Manor. He will be lying on the ground and has a crystal head. Talk to him for the Sorcery. Note: This Sorcery is needed for Sorceress Sellen's Questline.
Gelmir's Fury
Covers area with surge of magma from the earth
Reward for helping Recusant Bernahl with his task in Volcano Manor. Requires being part of Volcano Manor, finishing at least one Volcano Manor request, and you cannot of killed Rykard or gotten to Crumbling Farum Azula yet.
Name: Gelmir's Fury
Effect: Covers area with surge of magma from the earth
How to get: Reward for helping Recusant Bernahl with his task in Volcano Manor. Requires being part of Volcano Manor, finishing at least one Volcano Manor request, and you cannot of killed Rykard or gotten to Crumbling Farum Azula yet.
Rykard's Rancor
Releases searing spirits that repeatedly explode after delay
Gotten from Rykard's Remembrance obtained after killing the Boss of Volcano Manor.
Name: Rykard's Rancor
Effect: Releases searing spirits that repeatedly explode after delay
How to get: Gotten from Rykard's Remembrance obtained after killing the Boss of Volcano Manor.
Unseen Blade
Makes right-hand armament completely invisible
At the tower Mirage Rise located in North Altus Plateau, at the end of the path going West from the Minor Erdtree. To solve the puzzle, touch the three seals. One is South-West, One is East, and one is further East hidden by an Illusory Rock. The chest is at the top of the tower that appears.
Name: Unseen Blade
Effect: Makes right-hand armament completely invisible
How to get: At the tower Mirage Rise located in North Altus Plateau, at the end of the path going West from the Minor Erdtree. To solve the puzzle, touch the three seals. One is South-West, One is East, and one is further East hidden by an Illusory Rock. The chest is at the top of the tower that appears.
Unseen Form
Makes the caster semi-invisible
In the same chest as Unseen Blade
Name: Unseen Form
Effect: Makes the caster semi-invisible
How to get: In the same chest as Unseen Blade
Fia's Mist
Releases a mist of death before caster
Defeat the Boss located past the Across the Roots Grace. You can reach the Grace by going up the roots leading over the buildings.
Name: Fia's Mist
Effect: Releases a mist of death before caster
How to get: Defeat the Boss located past the Across the Roots Grace. You can reach the Grace by going up the roots leading over the buildings.
Zamor Ice Storms
Thrust staff into ground to create freezing tornado
South part of Zamor Ruins.
Name: Zamor Ice Storms
Effect: Thrust staff into ground to create freezing tornado
How to get: South part of Zamor Ruins.
Briars of Punishment
Wounds caster to unleash trail of bloodthorns
On the path North from the Zamor Ruins. Next to the fire guys.
Name: Briars of Punishment
Effect: Wounds caster to unleash trail of bloodthorns
How to get: On the path North from the Zamor Ruins. Next to the fire guys.
Founding Rain of Stars
Releases a downpour of star rain for a while
Freezing Lake Grace in the North-East. Go up the slope to the North and find the broken bridge on the Southern side of the cliff. The bridge is actually just invisible. Cross the bridge and near the end, on the left, you will see a small layer of mist, use the mist to go up and then into Heretical Rise. Inside you will find the spell.
Name: Founding Rain of Stars
Effect: Releases a downpour of star rain for a while
How to get: Freezing Lake Grace in the North-East. Go up the slope to the North and find the broken bridge on the Southern side of the cliff. The bridge is actually just invisible. Cross the bridge and near the end, on the left, you will see a small layer of mist, use the mist to go up and then into Heretical Rise. Inside you will find the spell.
Explosive Ghostflame
Causes ghostflame explosion that burns wide area
Kill the Death Rite Bird, South-East of the Apostate Derelict in the North-West section of the Consecrated Snowfield, at Night. Requires the Haligtree Medallion.
Name: Explosive Ghostflame
Effect: Causes ghostflame explosion that burns wide area
How to get: Kill the Death Rite Bird, South-East of the Apostate Derelict in the North-West section of the Consecrated Snowfield, at Night. Requires the Haligtree Medallion.
Meteorite of Astel
Calls a hail of small meteorites from the void
Kill the Boss of Yelough Anix Tunnel in West Consecrated Snowfield. Requires Haligtree Medallion.
Name: Meteorite of Astel
Effect: Calls a hail of small meteorites from the void
How to get: Kill the Boss of Yelough Anix Tunnel in West Consecrated Snowfield. Requires Haligtree Medallion.
Loretta's Mastery
Fires four great arrows from magic greatbow at once
Kill the first Boss of the Haligtree. Requires Haligtree Medallion.
Name: Loretta's Mastery
Effect: Fires four great arrows from magic greatbow at once
How to get: Kill the first Boss of the Haligtree. Requires Haligtree Medallion.
Miriam's Vanishing
Conceals self in a glintstone haze
Can be purchased from Count Ymir at the Cathedral of Manus Metyr for 10,000 Runes.
Name: Miriam's Vanishing
Effect: Conceals self in a glintstone haze
How to get: Can be purchased from Count Ymir at the Cathedral of Manus Metyr for 10,000 Runes.
Glintblade Trio
Creates sigil that forms three projectile glintblades after delay
Found by looting it off a corpse inside Castle Ensis. After progressing through the chapel with the Lazuli Sorcerers, go through the iron gate and fall off a ledge directly to the left. Go around the cliff and climb up the ladders to the rooftop of the chapel. Head northwest and jump down onto a platform to access the corpse that has the spell.
Name: Glintblade Trio
Effect: Creates sigil that forms three projectile glintblades after delay
How to get: Found by looting it off a corpse inside Castle Ensis. After progressing through the chapel with the Lazuli Sorcerers, go through the iron gate and fall off a ledge directly to the left. Go around the cliff and climb up the ladders to the rooftop of the chapel. Head northwest and jump down onto a platform to access the corpse that has the spell.
Rellana's Twin Moons
Incarnate twin moons and repeatedly strike the ground
Can be selected as one of the possible rewards when trading Remembrance of the Twin Moon Knight with Enia at the Roundtable Hold.
Name: Rellana's Twin Moons
Effect: Incarnate twin moons and repeatedly strike the ground
How to get: Can be selected as one of the possible rewards when trading Remembrance of the Twin Moon Knight with Enia at the Roundtable Hold.
Glintstone Nail
Fires a shattering magic nail
Can be bought from Count Ymir after completing the first step of his quest.
Name: Glintstone Nail
Effect: Fires a shattering magic nail
How to get: Can be bought from Count Ymir after completing the first step of his quest.
Glintstone Nails
Fires multiple shattering magic nails
Can be bought from Count Ymir after completing the first step of his quest.
Name: Glintstone Nails
Effect: Fires multiple shattering magic nails
How to get: Can be bought from Count Ymir after completing the first step of his quest.
Blades of Stone
Pulls blade-like clumps of rock from the earth
Can be selected as one of the possible rewards when trading Remembrance of the Wild Boar Rider with Enia at the Roundtable Hold.
Name: Blades of Stone
Effect: Pulls blade-like clumps of rock from the earth
How to get: Can be selected as one of the possible rewards when trading Remembrance of the Wild Boar Rider with Enia at the Roundtable Hold.
Gravitational Missile
Fires a bolt of gravity that pulls in enemies before exploding
Dropped by the Fallingstar Beast, who can be found in the crater in Fingerstone Hill.
Name: Gravitational Missile
Effect: Fires a bolt of gravity that pulls in enemies before exploding
How to get: Dropped by the Fallingstar Beast, who can be found in the crater in Fingerstone Hill.
Mantle of Thorns
Covers self with the Scadutree's impenetrable thorns
Shadow Keep: This item drops from the Lesser Ulcerated Tree Spirit enemy that emerges beneath the ground, near the large tree. Can only be accessed upon draining the water in the Church District.
Name: Mantle of Thorns
Effect: Covers self with the Scadutree's impenetrable thorns
How to get: Shadow Keep: This item drops from the Lesser Ulcerated Tree Spirit enemy that emerges beneath the ground, near the large tree. Can only be accessed upon draining the water in the Church District.
Impenetrable Thorns
Summons the Scadutree's impenetrable thorns from the earth
Shadow Keep: Backtrack from the "Dark Chamber Entrance" Site of Grace, cross the bridge and down the steps on the right, and it will be directly below you next to the sitting bat enemy.
Name: Impenetrable Thorns
Effect: Summons the Scadutree's impenetrable thorns from the earth
How to get: Shadow Keep: Backtrack from the "Dark Chamber Entrance" Site of Grace, cross the bridge and down the steps on the right, and it will be directly below you next to the sitting bat enemy.
Rings of Spectral Light
Creates rings of spectral light that fire in unison
Looted from the altar by the giant bird statue after defeating several birds in Charo's Hidden Grave
Name: Rings of Spectral Light
Effect: Creates rings of spectral light that fire in unison
How to get: Looted from the altar by the giant bird statue after defeating several birds in Charo's Hidden Grave
Vortex of Putrescence
Launches a whirl of putrescent jets
Can be selected as one of the possible rewards when trading Remembrance of Putrescence with Enia at the Roundtable Hold.
Name: Vortex of Putrescence
Effect: Launches a whirl of putrescent jets
How to get: Can be selected as one of the possible rewards when trading Remembrance of Putrescence with Enia at the Roundtable Hold.
Mass of Putrescence
Flings a great mass of putrescence
Stone Coffin Fissure: From the Fissure Waypoint site of grace, head northeast. Just after hopping over the little gap, drop down on the left (north) side and make your way north where you'll find the spell on a corpse.
Name: Mass of Putrescence
Effect: Flings a great mass of putrescence
How to get: Stone Coffin Fissure: From the Fissure Waypoint site of grace, head northeast. Just after hopping over the little gap, drop down on the left (north) side and make your way north where you'll find the spell on a corpse.
Fleeting Microcosm
Conjures a microcosm that pulses with a single wave, disappearing in a burst
Purchased from Count Ymir after sounding the second bell.
Name: Fleeting Microcosm
Effect: Conjures a microcosm that pulses with a single wave, disappearing in a burst
How to get: Purchased from Count Ymir after sounding the second bell.
Cherishing Fingers
Surrounds the caster with a mesh of hefty fingers
Can be picked up in the graveyard to the west of the Cathedral of Manus Metyr after completing Count Ymir's questline in full.
Name: Cherishing Fingers
Effect: Surrounds the caster with a mesh of hefty fingers
How to get: Can be picked up in the graveyard to the west of the Cathedral of Manus Metyr after completing Count Ymir's questline in full.
Beast Claw
Creates claws that tear through the land.
Bestial Sanctum: Reward from Gurranq, Beast Clergyman after giving him the fifth Deathroot. Seeit on Elden Ring Interactive Map Link.
Name: Beast Claw
Effect: Creates claws that tear through the land.
How to get: Bestial Sanctum: Reward from Gurranq, Beast Clergyman after giving him the fifth Deathroot. Seeit on Elden Ring Interactive Map Link.
Bestial Constitution
Fills the body with bestial vigor, alleviating buildup of frost and blood loss.
Dropped by a Teardrop Scarab along the cliffside northeast of the Minor Erdtree in Dragonbarrow.
Name: Bestial Constitution
Effect: Fills the body with bestial vigor, alleviating buildup of frost and blood loss.
How to get: Dropped by a Teardrop Scarab along the cliffside northeast of the Minor Erdtree in Dragonbarrow.
Bestial Sling
Swiftly flings a number of sharp rock shards. This incantation can be cast without delay after performing another action.
Bestial Sanctum: Reward from Gurranq, Beast Clergyman after giving him two Deathroot.
Name: Bestial Sling
Effect: Swiftly flings a number of sharp rock shards. This incantation can be cast without delay after performing another action.
How to get: Bestial Sanctum: Reward from Gurranq, Beast Clergyman after giving him two Deathroot.
Bestial Vitality
Fills the body with bestial vigor, restoring hp over a period of time.
Bestial Sanctum: Reward from Gurranq, Beast Clergyman after giving him the third Deathroot.
Name: Bestial Vitality
Effect: Fills the body with bestial vigor, restoring hp over a period of time.
How to get: Bestial Sanctum: Reward from Gurranq, Beast Clergyman after giving him the third Deathroot.
Gurrang's Beast Claw
Creates beast claws that rend surroundings with shockwaves.
Bestial Sanctum: Reward from Gurranq, Beast Clergyman after giving him the 8th Deathroot.
Name: Gurrang's Beast Claw
Effect: Creates beast claws that rend surroundings with shockwaves.
How to get: Bestial Sanctum: Reward from Gurranq, Beast Clergyman after giving him the 8th Deathroot.
Stone of Gurranq
Hurls a boulder before the caster. This incantation can be cast repeatedly.
Bestial Sanctum: Reward from Gurranq, Beast Clergyman after giving him the 6th Deathroot
Name: Stone of Gurranq
Effect: Hurls a boulder before the caster. This incantation can be cast repeatedly.
How to get: Bestial Sanctum: Reward from Gurranq, Beast Clergyman after giving him the 6th Deathroot
Bloodboon
Scatters bloodflame before caster to set area aflame.
Trade Remembrance of the Blood Lord with Enia at Roundtable Hold.
Name: Bloodboon
Effect: Scatters bloodflame before caster to set area aflame.
How to get: Trade Remembrance of the Blood Lord with Enia at Roundtable Hold.
Bloodflame Blade
Enchants right-hand armament with bloodflame
Liurnia of the Lakes: Dropped by a Teardrop Scarab in the marshes northwest to Rose Church, southwest of the lake
Name: Bloodflame Blade
Effect: Enchants right-hand armament with bloodflame
How to get: Liurnia of the Lakes: Dropped by a Teardrop Scarab in the marshes northwest to Rose Church, southwest of the lake
Bloodflame Talons
Creates bloodflame lacerations that then explode
Dropped by Mohg, the Omen in Forsaken Depths, Subterranean Shunning-Grounds, under Leyndell
Name: Bloodflame Talons
Effect: Creates bloodflame lacerations that then explode
How to get: Dropped by Mohg, the Omen in Forsaken Depths, Subterranean Shunning-Grounds, under Leyndell
Swarm Of Flies
Releases a swarm of bloodflies before the caster
Found on a corpse along the east wall (in a shallow cave) of the Mohgwyn Palace blood marsh, directly north from the Palace Approach Ledge-Road Site of Grace.
Name: Swarm Of Flies
Effect: Releases a swarm of bloodflies before the caster
How to get: Found on a corpse along the east wall (in a shallow cave) of the Mohgwyn Palace blood marsh, directly north from the Palace Approach Ledge-Road Site of Grace.
Agheel's Flame
Spews flame breath of Agheel from above
Can be purchased at the Dragon Communion Altar at the Cathedral of Dragon Communion in Caelid for 2 Dragon Hearts. Players need to defeat Flying Dragon Agheel in order to unlock this Incantation.
Name: Agheel's Flame
Effect: Spews flame breath of Agheel from above
How to get: Can be purchased at the Dragon Communion Altar at the Cathedral of Dragon Communion in Caelid for 2 Dragon Hearts. Players need to defeat Flying Dragon Agheel in order to unlock this Incantation.
Borealis's Mist
Spews icy breath of Borealis from above
Can be purchased at the Dragon Communion Altar at the Cathedral of Dragon Communion. Players need to defeat Borealis the Freezing Fog in order to unlock this Incantation.
Name: Borealis's Mist
Effect: Spews icy breath of Borealis from above
How to get: Can be purchased at the Dragon Communion Altar at the Cathedral of Dragon Communion. Players need to defeat Borealis the Freezing Fog in order to unlock this Incantation.
Dragonclaw
Channels dragon to rend foes with dragon claws
Found on the island with the Church of Dragon Communion. You need 1 Dragon Heart in order to acquire it. Can be purchased at the Dragon Communion Altar at the Cathedral of Dragon Communion for 1 Dragon Heart.
Name: Dragonclaw
Effect: Channels dragon to rend foes with dragon claws
How to get: Found on the island with the Church of Dragon Communion. You need 1 Dragon Heart in order to acquire it. Can be purchased at the Dragon Communion Altar at the Cathedral of Dragon Communion for 1 Dragon Heart.
Dragonfire
Channels dragon to spew flame breath
Found on the island with the Church of Dragon Communion. You need 1 Dragon Heart in order to acquire it. Can be purchased at the Dragon Communion Altar at the Cathedral of Dragon Communion for 1 Dragon Heart
Name: Dragonfire
Effect: Channels dragon to spew flame breath
How to get: Found on the island with the Church of Dragon Communion. You need 1 Dragon Heart in order to acquire it. Can be purchased at the Dragon Communion Altar at the Cathedral of Dragon Communion for 1 Dragon Heart
Dragonice
Channels dragon to spew icy breath
Can be purchased at the Dragon Communion Altar at the Cathedral of Dragon Communion for 1 Dragon Heart.
Name: Dragonice
Effect: Channels dragon to spew icy breath
How to get: Can be purchased at the Dragon Communion Altar at the Cathedral of Dragon Communion for 1 Dragon Heart.
Dragonmaw
Channels dragon to bite foes before caster
Found on the island with the Church of Dragon Communion. You need 1 Dragon Heart in order to acquire it. Can be purchased at the Dragon Communion Altar at the Cathedral of Dragon Communion for 1 Dragon Heart.
Name: Dragonmaw
Effect: Channels dragon to bite foes before caster
How to get: Found on the island with the Church of Dragon Communion. You need 1 Dragon Heart in order to acquire it. Can be purchased at the Dragon Communion Altar at the Cathedral of Dragon Communion for 1 Dragon Heart.
Ekzykes's Decay
Spews scarlet rot breath of Ekzykes from above
Can be purchased from the Cathedral of Dragon Communion in Caelid after defeating Decaying Ekzykes.
Name: Ekzykes's Decay
Effect: Spews scarlet rot breath of Ekzykes from above
How to get: Can be purchased from the Cathedral of Dragon Communion in Caelid after defeating Decaying Ekzykes.
Glintstone Breath
Channels dragon to spew magic breath.
Can be purchased at the Dragon Communion Altar at the Cathedral of Dragon Communion for 1 Dragon Heart.
Name: Glintstone Breath
Effect: Channels dragon to spew magic breath.
How to get: Can be purchased at the Dragon Communion Altar at the Cathedral of Dragon Communion for 1 Dragon Heart.
Greyoll's Roar
Emits the roar of Elder Dragon Greyoll.
Can be purchased at the Dragon Communion Altar at the Cathedral of Dragon Communion for Dragon Heart. You need to defeat Greyoll in order to unlock this Incantation.
Name: Greyoll's Roar
Effect: Emits the roar of Elder Dragon Greyoll.
How to get: Can be purchased at the Dragon Communion Altar at the Cathedral of Dragon Communion for Dragon Heart. You need to defeat Greyoll in order to unlock this Incantation.
Magma Breath
Channels wyrm to spew magma breath
Can be purchased at the Dragon Communion Altar at the Cathedral of Dragon Communion for 1 Dragon Heart after killing the Magma Wyrm located southwest of the Seethewater Terminus grace in Mt. Gelmir.
Name: Magma Breath
Effect: Channels wyrm to spew magma breath
How to get: Can be purchased at the Dragon Communion Altar at the Cathedral of Dragon Communion for 1 Dragon Heart after killing the Magma Wyrm located southwest of the Seethewater Terminus grace in Mt. Gelmir.
Rotten Breath
Channels dragon to spew scarlet rot breath
Can be purchased at the Dragon Communion Altar at the Cathedral of Dragon Communion for 1 Dragon Heart
Name: Rotten Breath
Effect: Channels dragon to spew scarlet rot breath
How to get: Can be purchased at the Dragon Communion Altar at the Cathedral of Dragon Communion for 1 Dragon Heart
Smarag's Glintstone Breath
Spews magic breath of Glintstone Dragon Smarag from above
Can be purchased at the Dragon Communion Altar at the Cathedral of Dragon Communion in Caelid for 2 Dragon Hearts. Glintstone Dragon Smarag must first be defeated in order to unlock this Incantation.
Name: Smarag's Glintstone Breath
Effect: Spews magic breath of Glintstone Dragon Smarag from above
How to get: Can be purchased at the Dragon Communion Altar at the Cathedral of Dragon Communion in Caelid for 2 Dragon Hearts. Glintstone Dragon Smarag must first be defeated in order to unlock this Incantation.
Theodorix's Magma
Spews magma breath of Theodorix from above
Purchase from Cathedral of Dragon Communion for 2x Dragon Heart, after defeating Great Wyrm Theodorix.
Name: Theodorix's Magma
Effect: Spews magma breath of Theodorix from above
How to get: Purchase from Cathedral of Dragon Communion for 2x Dragon Heart, after defeating Great Wyrm Theodorix.
Ancient Dragons' Lightning Spear
Stabs with red lightning spear from above
Purchase from Brother Corhyn or Miriel, Pastor of Vows after giving either the Ancient Dragon Prayerbook
Name: Ancient Dragons' Lightning Spear
Effect: Stabs with red lightning spear from above
How to get: Purchase from Brother Corhyn or Miriel, Pastor of Vows after giving either the Ancient Dragon Prayerbook
Ancient Dragons' Lightning Strike
Summons red lightning that spreads from impact
Purchase from Brother Corhyn or Miriel, Pastor of Vows after giving either the Ancient Dragon Prayerbook
Name: Ancient Dragons' Lightning Strike
Effect: Summons red lightning that spreads from impact
How to get: Purchase from Brother Corhyn or Miriel, Pastor of Vows after giving either the Ancient Dragon Prayerbook
Death Lightning
Strikes surroundings with storm of death lightning
Trade Remembrance of the Lichdragon with Enia at Roundtable Hold.
Name: Death Lightning
Effect: Strikes surroundings with storm of death lightning
How to get: Trade Remembrance of the Lichdragon with Enia at Roundtable Hold.
Dragonbolt Blessing
Bolsters caster's body with lightning
Found at Stormcaller Church, inside a chest that's against a wall.
Name: Dragonbolt Blessing
Effect: Bolsters caster's body with lightning
How to get: Found at Stormcaller Church, inside a chest that's against a wall.
Electrify Armament
Enchants right-hand armament with lightning damage
Purchase from Brother Corhyn or Miriel, Pastor of Vows after giving either the Dragon Cult Prayerbook
Name: Electrify Armament
Effect: Enchants right-hand armament with lightning damage
How to get: Purchase from Brother Corhyn or Miriel, Pastor of Vows after giving either the Dragon Cult Prayerbook
Fortissax's Lightning Spear
Stabs from above with two red lightning spears in tandem
Trade Remembrance of the Lichdragon with Enia at Roundtable Hold.
Name: Fortissax's Lightning Spear
Effect: Stabs from above with two red lightning spears in tandem
How to get: Trade Remembrance of the Lichdragon with Enia at Roundtable Hold.
Frozen Lightning Spear
Stabs with ice lightning spear from above
Dropped by Dragonkin Soldier of Nokstella
Name: Frozen Lightning Spear
Effect: Stabs with ice lightning spear from above
How to get: Dropped by Dragonkin Soldier of Nokstella
Honed Bolt
Strikes foe with lightning bolt from above
Purchase from Brother Corhyn or Miriel, Pastor of Vows after giving either the Dragon Cult Prayerbook
Name: Honed Bolt
Effect: Strikes foe with lightning bolt from above
How to get: Purchase from Brother Corhyn or Miriel, Pastor of Vows after giving either the Dragon Cult Prayerbook
Lansseax's Glaive
Sweeps from above with red lightning glaive.
Dropped by Ancient Dragon Lansseax.
Name: Lansseax's Glaive
Effect: Sweeps from above with red lightning glaive.
How to get: Dropped by Ancient Dragon Lansseax.
Lightning Spear
Hurls lightning spear before caster""
Purchase from Brother Corhyn or Miriel, Pastor of Vows after giving either the Dragon Cult Prayerbook which is dropped by a Leyndell knight patrolling south of Artist's Shack.
Name: Lightning Spear
Effect: Hurls lightning spear before caster""
How to get: Purchase from Brother Corhyn or Miriel, Pastor of Vows after giving either the Dragon Cult Prayerbook which is dropped by a Leyndell knight patrolling south of Artist's Shack.
Lightning Strike
Summons lightning bolt that spreads from impact.
Weeping Peninsula: Dropped by a Teardrop Scarab found in a crevasse separating the landmass containing the Minor Erdtree from the eastern side of the peninsula. The scarab is found in the Southern section of the crevasse, South of the entrance to Morne Tunnel, surrounded by Giant Bats and a constant beat of lightning strikes from above. There are stone platforms on either cliffsides you can use to descend safely.
Name: Lightning Strike
Effect: Summons lightning bolt that spreads from impact.
How to get: Weeping Peninsula: Dropped by a Teardrop Scarab found in a crevasse separating the landmass containing the Minor Erdtree from the eastern side of the peninsula. The scarab is found in the Southern section of the crevasse, South of the entrance to Morne Tunnel, surrounded by Giant Bats and a constant beat of lightning strikes from above. There are stone platforms on either cliffsides you can use to descend safely.
Placidusax's Ruin
Spews golden breath of Dragonlord Placidusax
Trade Remembrance of the Dragonlord with Enia at Roundtable Hold.
Name: Placidusax's Ruin
Effect: Spews golden breath of Dragonlord Placidusax
How to get: Trade Remembrance of the Dragonlord with Enia at Roundtable Hold.
Vyke's Dragonbolt
Enchants right-hand armament with lightning damage
Received after defeating Roundtable Knight Vyke at Lord Contender's Evergaol.
Name: Vyke's Dragonbolt
Effect: Enchants right-hand armament with lightning damage
How to get: Received after defeating Roundtable Knight Vyke at Lord Contender's Evergaol.
Aspect Of The Crucible: Breath
Creates throat pouch to spew fire while walking
Rykard, Lord of Blasphemy boss arena. Kill Tanith as she sits eating Rykards Corpse, and her Knight will invade you. Defeat him, and he will drop the Aspect.
Name: Aspect Of The Crucible: Breath
Effect: Creates throat pouch to spew fire while walking
How to get: Rykard, Lord of Blasphemy boss arena. Kill Tanith as she sits eating Rykards Corpse, and her Knight will invade you. Defeat him, and he will drop the Aspect.
Aspect Of The Crucible Horns
Creates shoulder horn to gore foes from a low stance.
Dropped by Crucible Knight found in Stormveil Castle directly below the Ramparts.
Name: Aspect Of The Crucible Horns
Effect: Creates shoulder horn to gore foes from a low stance.
How to get: Dropped by Crucible Knight found in Stormveil Castle directly below the Ramparts.
Aspects Of The Crucible: Tail
Creates supple tail to sweep area before caster
Dropped by the Crucible Knight boss in Stormhill Evergaol.
Name: Aspects Of The Crucible: Tail
Effect: Creates supple tail to sweep area before caster
How to get: Dropped by the Crucible Knight boss in Stormhill Evergaol.
Barrier Of Gold
Greatly increases magic damage negation for self & allies
Leyndell, Royal Capital: Dropped by an invisible Teardrop Scarab. Can be found after heading down the stairs and taking the elevator, right after the fight with Godfrey, First Elden Lord (Golden Shade).
Name: Barrier Of Gold
Effect: Greatly increases magic damage negation for self & allies
How to get: Leyndell, Royal Capital: Dropped by an invisible Teardrop Scarab. Can be found after heading down the stairs and taking the elevator, right after the fight with Godfrey, First Elden Lord (Golden Shade).
Black Blade
Black blade spinning slash that emits wave of light.
Trade Remembrance of the Black Blade with Enia at Roundtable Hold.
Name: Black Blade
Effect: Black blade spinning slash that emits wave of light.
How to get: Trade Remembrance of the Black Blade with Enia at Roundtable Hold.
Blessing Of The Erdtree
Grants greater blessing to self and nearby allies
Found at Queens Bedchamber in Leyndell Royal Capital
Name: Blessing Of The Erdtree
Effect: Grants greater blessing to self and nearby allies
How to get: Found at Queens Bedchamber in Leyndell Royal Capital
Blessing's Boon
Grants blessing to self and nearby allies
Can be purchased from Miriel, Pastor of Vows at the Church of Vows for 4,000 Runes. Blessings boon is found by defeating the first ancestral spirit after lighting the pillars in underground.
Name: Blessing's Boon
Effect: Grants blessing to self and nearby allies
How to get: Can be purchased from Miriel, Pastor of Vows at the Church of Vows for 4,000 Runes. Blessings boon is found by defeating the first ancestral spirit after lighting the pillars in underground.
Elden Stars
Creates a steam of golden shooting stars that assail the area.
In the Deeproot Depths, head west from the Great Waterfall Crest grace until you reach some roots. From there look to the north-west to see a root going up to a cave and follow it. Enter the cave and fight through the packs of Giant Ants until the end and you'll find Elden Stars on a body facing the cave exit.
Name: Elden Stars
Effect: Creates a steam of golden shooting stars that assail the area.
How to get: In the Deeproot Depths, head west from the Great Waterfall Crest grace until you reach some roots. From there look to the north-west to see a root going up to a cave and follow it. Enter the cave and fight through the packs of Giant Ants until the end and you'll find Elden Stars on a body facing the cave exit.
Erdtree Heal
Vastly heals HP for self and nearby allies
Can be found in Queen's Bedchamber in Leyndell, Capital of Ash
Name: Erdtree Heal
Effect: Vastly heals HP for self and nearby allies
How to get: Can be found in Queen's Bedchamber in Leyndell, Capital of Ash
Golden Lightning Fortification
Greatly increases lightning resistance for self and allies
Crumbling Farum Azula: Dropped by a Teardrop Scarab found by the cliffs south of the fountain plaza. This area is located in the upper level after ascending the Dragon Temple Lift
Name: Golden Lightning Fortification
Effect: Greatly increases lightning resistance for self and allies
How to get: Crumbling Farum Azula: Dropped by a Teardrop Scarab found by the cliffs south of the fountain plaza. This area is located in the upper level after ascending the Dragon Temple Lift
Golden Vow
Increases attack and defense for self and allies
Corpse-Stench Shack, in Mt Gelmir.
Name: Golden Vow
Effect: Increases attack and defense for self and allies
How to get: Corpse-Stench Shack, in Mt Gelmir.
Protection Of The Erdtree
Increases affinity damage negation for self & allies
Dropped by an incantation scarab found on a stone platform slightly east of Goldmask's first location, in Altus Plateau
Name: Protection Of The Erdtree
Effect: Increases affinity damage negation for self & allies
How to get: Dropped by an incantation scarab found on a stone platform slightly east of Goldmask's first location, in Altus Plateau
Wrath Of Gold
Produces golden shockwave that knocks back foes
Found at Woodfolk Ruins. Among the enemies, there is a staircase that goes down and leads to a chest that contains this Incantation.
Name: Wrath Of Gold
Effect: Produces golden shockwave that knocks back foes
How to get: Found at Woodfolk Ruins. Among the enemies, there is a staircase that goes down and leads to a chest that contains this Incantation.
Burn, O Flame!
Raises a series of flame pillars around caster
Trade Remembrance of the Fire Giant with Enia at Roundtable Hold.
Name: Burn, O Flame!
Effect: Raises a series of flame pillars around caster
How to get: Trade Remembrance of the Fire Giant with Enia at Roundtable Hold.
Flame Of The Fell God
Summons raging fireball that explodes and sets the area ablaze
Liurnia of the Lakes: Dropped by Adan, Thief of Fire upon defeat.
Name: Flame Of The Fell God
Effect: Summons raging fireball that explodes and sets the area ablaze
How to get: Liurnia of the Lakes: Dropped by Adan, Thief of Fire upon defeat.
Flame, Fall Upon Them
Hurls several balls of fire at once
Purchase from Brother Corhyn or Miriel, Pastor of Vows after giving them the Giant's Prayerbook for 10k runes
Name: Flame, Fall Upon Them
Effect: Hurls several balls of fire at once
How to get: Purchase from Brother Corhyn or Miriel, Pastor of Vows after giving them the Giant's Prayerbook for 10k runes
Giantsflame Take Thee
Hurls massive ball of raging fire
Purchase from Brother Corhyn or Miriel, Pastor of Vows after giving them the Giant's Prayerbook for 13k runes
Name: Giantsflame Take Thee
Effect: Hurls massive ball of raging fire
How to get: Purchase from Brother Corhyn or Miriel, Pastor of Vows after giving them the Giant's Prayerbook for 13k runes
Catch Flame
Momentarily sparks flame from hand
Starting equipment for the Prophet Class. Sold by Brother Corhyn at the Roundtable Hold for 600 runes
Name: Catch Flame
Effect: Momentarily sparks flame from hand
How to get: Starting equipment for the Prophet Class. Sold by Brother Corhyn at the Roundtable Hold for 600 runes
Fire's Deadly Sin
Sets area and self ablaze with raging flames
Acquire the Flightless Bird Painting from Leyndell, Royal Capital. Then go to Windmill Heights southeast overlook, south of Windmill Village
Name: Fire's Deadly Sin
Effect: Sets area and self ablaze with raging flames
How to get: Acquire the Flightless Bird Painting from Leyndell, Royal Capital. Then go to Windmill Heights southeast overlook, south of Windmill Village
Flame Sling
Throws balls of raging fire.
Sold by Brother Corhyn at the Roundtable Hold for 800 runes
Name: Flame Sling
Effect: Throws balls of raging fire.
How to get: Sold by Brother Corhyn at the Roundtable Hold for 800 runes
Flame, Cleanse Me
Alleviates buildup of and cures poison and scarlet rot
Held by one of the corpses at the Fire Monk camp, southeast of the Church of Vows.
Name: Flame, Cleanse Me
Effect: Alleviates buildup of and cures poison and scarlet rot
How to get: Held by one of the corpses at the Fire Monk camp, southeast of the Church of Vows.
Flame, Grant Me Strength
Raises physical and fire-affinity attack power
Found behind Fort Gael, on a body between two Maneuverable Flamethrowers.
Name: Flame, Grant Me Strength
Effect: Raises physical and fire-affinity attack power
How to get: Found behind Fort Gael, on a body between two Maneuverable Flamethrowers.
Flame, Protect Me
Greatly increases fire damage negation
Giant-Conquering Hero's Grave: Found on a corpse inside a sealed room near the beginning, in front of the Site of Grace. The room requires one Stonesword Key to unlock.
Name: Flame, Protect Me
Effect: Greatly increases fire damage negation
How to get: Giant-Conquering Hero's Grave: Found on a corpse inside a sealed room near the beginning, in front of the Site of Grace. The room requires one Stonesword Key to unlock.
O, Flame!
Momentarily sparks roaring flame from hand
Purchase from Brother Corhyn or Miriel, Pastor of Vows after giving either the Fire Monks' Prayerbook
Name: O, Flame!
Effect: Momentarily sparks roaring flame from hand
How to get: Purchase from Brother Corhyn or Miriel, Pastor of Vows after giving either the Fire Monks' Prayerbook
Surge, O Flame!
Incinerates area before caster with stream of fire
Purchase from Brother Corhyn or Miriel, Pastor of Vows after giving either the Fire Monks' Prayerbook.
Name: Surge, O Flame!
Effect: Incinerates area before caster with stream of fire
How to get: Purchase from Brother Corhyn or Miriel, Pastor of Vows after giving either the Fire Monks' Prayerbook.
Whirl, O Flame!
Sweeps area before caster with stream of fire
Dropped from a Teardrop Scarab on the road between Rotview Balcony and Caelem Ruins next to the wagon.
Name: Whirl, O Flame!
Effect: Sweeps area before caster with stream of fire
How to get: Dropped from a Teardrop Scarab on the road between Rotview Balcony and Caelem Ruins next to the wagon.
Frenzied Burst
Emits concentrated blast of yellow flame of frenzy from eyes
Dropped by a Teardrop Scarab in the Liurnia of the Lakes region, south of the Church of Inhibition near some frenzied rats
Name: Frenzied Burst
Effect: Emits concentrated blast of yellow flame of frenzy from eyes
How to get: Dropped by a Teardrop Scarab in the Liurnia of the Lakes region, south of the Church of Inhibition near some frenzied rats
Howl Of Shabriri
Shrieks, building up madness in nearby foes
Found in a chest on the second level of the Frenzy-Flaming Tower.
Name: Howl Of Shabriri
Effect: Shrieks, building up madness in nearby foes
How to get: Found in a chest on the second level of the Frenzy-Flaming Tower.
Inescapable Frenzy
Latches onto foes to spread madness
After making your way past Subterranean Shunning-Grounds and defeating Mohg, The Omen, attack the altar at the front of the boss room. It should lower revealing a new area. Continue through here until you are forced to parkour downwards using stone coffins as platforms. Near the bottom you will see a corpse that has Inescapable Frenzy on it.
Name: Inescapable Frenzy
Effect: Latches onto foes to spread madness
How to get: After making your way past Subterranean Shunning-Grounds and defeating Mohg, The Omen, attack the altar at the front of the boss room. It should lower revealing a new area. Continue through here until you are forced to parkour downwards using stone coffins as platforms. Near the bottom you will see a corpse that has Inescapable Frenzy on it.
The Flame Of Frenzy
Emits burst of yellow flame of frenzy from eyes
Callu Baptismal Church in the Weeping Peninsula. Found on a corpse by a pillar on the left side of the church.
Name: The Flame Of Frenzy
Effect: Emits burst of yellow flame of frenzy from eyes
How to get: Callu Baptismal Church in the Weeping Peninsula. Found on a corpse by a pillar on the left side of the church.
Unendurable Frenzy
Emits violent burst of yellow flame of frenzy from eyes.
Yelough Anix Ruins: Found in a chest inside an underground treasure room in the central section of the ruins
Name: Unendurable Frenzy
Effect: Emits violent burst of yellow flame of frenzy from eyes.
How to get: Yelough Anix Ruins: Found in a chest inside an underground treasure room in the central section of the ruins
Black Flame
Throws a ball of raging black fire
This incantation is unlocked for purchase after giving a Godskin Prayerbook to Brother Corhyn.
Name: Black Flame
Effect: Throws a ball of raging black fire
How to get: This incantation is unlocked for purchase after giving a Godskin Prayerbook to Brother Corhyn.
Black Flame Blade
Enchants right-hand armament with black flame
This incantation is unlocked for purchase after giving a Godskin Prayerbook to Brother Corhyn.
Name: Black Flame Blade
Effect: Enchants right-hand armament with black flame
How to get: This incantation is unlocked for purchase after giving a Godskin Prayerbook to Brother Corhyn.
Black Flame Ritual
Summons circle of black flame pillars around caster.
Spiritcaller Cave: Dropped by the Godskin Apostle & Godskin Noble in a consecutive boss encounter.
Name: Black Flame Ritual
Effect: Summons circle of black flame pillars around caster.
How to get: Spiritcaller Cave: Dropped by the Godskin Apostle & Godskin Noble in a consecutive boss encounter.
Black Flame's Protection
Increases phyiscal damage negation
Recieved from Gideon Ofnir, after selecting the 'about the secret medalion' dialogue option. In order for this question to appear, you will first need Haligtree Secret Medallion (Left) and Haligtree Secret Medallion (Right). The dialogue option is unlocked upon reaching Miquella's Haligtree.
Name: Black Flame's Protection
Effect: Increases phyiscal damage negation
How to get: Recieved from Gideon Ofnir, after selecting the 'about the secret medalion' dialogue option. In order for this question to appear, you will first need Haligtree Secret Medallion (Left) and Haligtree Secret Medallion (Right). The dialogue option is unlocked upon reaching Miquella's Haligtree.
Noble Presence
Thrust out belly with gusto to unleash repelling shockwave
Acquired from defeating the Godskin Noble at the Volcano Manor
Name: Noble Presence
Effect: Thrust out belly with gusto to unleash repelling shockwave
How to get: Acquired from defeating the Godskin Noble at the Volcano Manor
Scouring Black Flame
Sweeps area before caster with black flame
Dropped by Godskin Apostle.
Name: Scouring Black Flame
Effect: Sweeps area before caster with black flame
How to get: Dropped by Godskin Apostle.
Discus Of Light
Fires ring of light before the caster
Purchase from Brother Corhyn for 11,000 runes after he moves to Goldmask's location at Altus Plateau.
Name: Discus Of Light
Effect: Fires ring of light before the caster
How to get: Purchase from Brother Corhyn for 11,000 runes after he moves to Goldmask's location at Altus Plateau.
Immutable Shield
Increases left-hand shield's affinity/ailment resistance
Purchasable from Brother Corhyn as part of his quest to the west of the Erdtree Sanctuary at the colosseum overlooking Leyndell.
Name: Immutable Shield
Effect: Increases left-hand shield's affinity/ailment resistance
How to get: Purchasable from Brother Corhyn as part of his quest to the west of the Erdtree Sanctuary at the colosseum overlooking Leyndell.
Law Of Causality
Retaliates upon receiving a number of blows
Given by Gideon Ofnir after beating Mohg, Lord of Blood and asking about the cocoon in the boss arena.
Name: Law Of Causality
Effect: Retaliates upon receiving a number of blows
How to get: Given by Gideon Ofnir after beating Mohg, Lord of Blood and asking about the cocoon in the boss arena.
Law Of Regression
Heals all ailments and dispels all special effects
Golden Order Principia prayerbook.
Name: Law Of Regression
Effect: Heals all ailments and dispels all special effects
How to get: Golden Order Principia prayerbook.
Litany Of Proper Death
Creates image of Order to deal holy damage
Can be purchased from D, Hunter of The Dead for 2,500 runes OR can be purchased from Twin Maiden Husks at the Roundtable Hold after giving them D's Bell Bearing
Name: Litany Of Proper Death
Effect: Creates image of Order to deal holy damage
How to get: Can be purchased from D, Hunter of The Dead for 2,500 runes OR can be purchased from Twin Maiden Husks at the Roundtable Hold after giving them D's Bell Bearing
Order Healing
Alleviates death blight buildup
Dropped by a Teardrop Scarab found in the middle of a circular section of the Siofra Aqueduct. Accessible only after unlocking upper areas of Siofra Aqueduct
Name: Order Healing
Effect: Alleviates death blight buildup
How to get: Dropped by a Teardrop Scarab found in the middle of a circular section of the Siofra Aqueduct. Accessible only after unlocking upper areas of Siofra Aqueduct
Order's Blade
Enchanted right-hand armament with holy damage
Can be purchased from D, Hunter of The Dead for 3,000 Runes OR can be purchased from Twin Maiden Husks at the Roundtable Hold after giving them D's Bell Bearing
Name: Order's Blade
Effect: Enchanted right-hand armament with holy damage
How to get: Can be purchased from D, Hunter of The Dead for 3,000 Runes OR can be purchased from Twin Maiden Husks at the Roundtable Hold after giving them D's Bell Bearing
Radagon's Rings Of Light
Creates golden ring of light to attack wide area
Golden Order Principia prayerbook
Name: Radagon's Rings Of Light
Effect: Creates golden ring of light to attack wide area
How to get: Golden Order Principia prayerbook
Triple Rings Of Light
Fire three rings of light before the caster
Elphael, Brace of The Haligtree: From the Prayer Room grace, head out onto the eastern walkway and drop down one level by using the roofs on the right. There is a sealed treasure room just under the Prayer Room that requires 2 Stonesword Keys to unlock. The chest containing the spell is inside.
Name: Triple Rings Of Light
Effect: Fire three rings of light before the caster
How to get: Elphael, Brace of The Haligtree: From the Prayer Room grace, head out onto the eastern walkway and drop down one level by using the roofs on the right. There is a sealed treasure room just under the Prayer Room that requires 2 Stonesword Keys to unlock. The chest containing the spell is inside.
Pest Threads
Launches countless sticky threads before caster
Sold by Gowry for 7,500 Runes after progressing Millicent's questline and giving her the Valkyrie prosthesis.
Name: Pest Threads
Effect: Launches countless sticky threads before caster
How to get: Sold by Gowry for 7,500 Runes after progressing Millicent's questline and giving her the Valkyrie prosthesis.
Poison Armament
Enchants armament held in the right hand with poison
Dropped by an invisible Teardrop Scarab roaming the northeast section Aeonia Swamp in eastern Caelid. Watch for the glowing footprints, figure out its pattern then get in front of it and attack as the prints approach you
Name: Poison Armament
Effect: Enchants armament held in the right hand with poison
How to get: Dropped by an invisible Teardrop Scarab roaming the northeast section Aeonia Swamp in eastern Caelid. Watch for the glowing footprints, figure out its pattern then get in front of it and attack as the prints approach you
Poison Mist
Releases poison mist before caster.
Weeping Peninsula: Dropped by a Teardrop Scarab in a forested area southeast of the Castle Morne Rampart Site of Grace
Name: Poison Mist
Effect: Releases poison mist before caster.
How to get: Weeping Peninsula: Dropped by a Teardrop Scarab in a forested area southeast of the Castle Morne Rampart Site of Grace
Scarlet Aeonia
Creates a giant flower that explodes with scarlet rot.
Trade Remembrance of the Rot Goddess with Enia at Roundtable Hold.
Name: Scarlet Aeonia
Effect: Creates a giant flower that explodes with scarlet rot.
How to get: Trade Remembrance of the Rot Goddess with Enia at Roundtable Hold.
Assassin's Approach
Silences footsteps, reduces fall damage / sound
Starting Incantation for the Confessor Class OR Purchase from Brother Corhyn or Miriel, Pastor of Vows after giving either the Assassin's Prayerbook.
Name: Assassin's Approach
Effect: Silences footsteps, reduces fall damage / sound
How to get: Starting Incantation for the Confessor Class OR Purchase from Brother Corhyn or Miriel, Pastor of Vows after giving either the Assassin's Prayerbook.

Cures Poison ailment and reduces poison build-up.
Sold by Brother Corhyn at the Roundtable Hold for 1,000 runes
Name: Cure Poison
Effect: Cures Poison ailment and reduces poison build-up.
How to get: Sold by Brother Corhyn at the Roundtable Hold for 1,000 runes

Creates area of darkness that conceals caster
Purchase from Brother Corhyn or Miriel, Pastor of Vows after giving either the Assassin's Prayerbook.

Effect: Creates area of darkness that conceals caster
How to get: Purchase from Brother Corhyn or Miriel, Pastor of Vows after giving either the Assassin's Prayerbook.
Divine Fortification
Increases holy damage negation.
Weeping Peninsula: Dropped by a Teardrop Scarab atop a collapsed stone structure overgrown with yellow moss. This structure is found a short distance southwest of the Tombsward Ruins.
Name: Divine Fortification
Effect: Increases holy damage negation.
How to get: Weeping Peninsula: Dropped by a Teardrop Scarab atop a collapsed stone structure overgrown with yellow moss. This structure is found a short distance southwest of the Tombsward Ruins.

Lord's Aid
Alleviates poison / blood loss / sleep buildup for self / allies
Purchase from Brother Corhyn or Miriel, Pastor of Vows after giving either the Two Fingers' Prayerbook.
Name: Lord's Aid
Effect: Alleviates poison / blood loss / sleep buildup for self / allies
How to get: Purchase from Brother Corhyn or Miriel, Pastor of Vows after giving either the Two Fingers' Prayerbook.
Lord's Divine Fortification
Greatly increases holy damage negation incl. allies
After defeating Malenia, Blade of Miquella talk to Gideon Ofnir about the haligtree roots. Purchasable at Twin Maiden Husks after defeating Maliketh, the Black Blade.
Name: Lord's Divine Fortification
Effect: Greatly increases holy damage negation incl. allies
How to get: After defeating Malenia, Blade of Miquella talk to Gideon Ofnir about the haligtree roots. Purchasable at Twin Maiden Husks after defeating Maliketh, the Black Blade.

Massively heals HP for self and nearby allies

Effect: Massively heals HP for self and nearby allies
How to get: Purchase from Brother Corhyn or Miriel, Pastor of Vows after giving either the Two Fingers' Prayerbook.

Rejection
Produces a shockwave that pushes away foes.
Sold by Brother Corhyn at the Roundtable Hold for 1,500
Name: Rejection
Effect: Produces a shockwave that pushes away foes.
How to get: Sold by Brother Corhyn at the Roundtable Hold for 1,500
Shadow Bait
Creates shadow that lures the aggression of foes of human build
Can be found on a corpse at Subterranean Shunning-Grounds, after going through the pipe room to a room with the corpse sitting at the center, next to a not very well hidden Ogre ready to strike.
Name: Shadow Bait
Effect: Creates shadow that lures the aggression of foes of human build
How to get: Can be found on a corpse at Subterranean Shunning-Grounds, after going through the pipe room to a room with the corpse sitting at the center, next to a not very well hidden Ogre ready to strike.
Urgent Heal
Heals a small amount of HP.
Starting equipment for the Confessor Class. Sold by Brother Corhyn at the Roundtable Hold for 1,000
Name: Urgent Heal
Effect: Heals a small amount of HP.
How to get: Starting equipment for the Confessor Class. Sold by Brother Corhyn at the Roundtable Hold for 1,000
Furious Blade of Ansbach
Cleaves through enemies with bloodflame blade summoned from side of the hand
Complete Sir Ansbach's questline all the way through the end, and side with him when facing Leda, and then fight Promised Consort Radahn/ Radahn, Consort of Miquella. After the fight is over, Sir Ansbach's body will be near the Site of Grace, alongside with his equipment and this Incantation.
Name: Furious Blade of Ansbach
Effect: Cleaves through enemies with bloodflame blade summoned from side of the hand
How to get: Complete Sir Ansbach's questline all the way through the end, and side with him when facing Leda, and then fight Promised Consort Radahn/ Radahn, Consort of Miquella. After the fight is over, Sir Ansbach's body will be near the Site of Grace, alongside with his equipment and this Incantation.
Heal from Afar
Greatly heals HP for distant allies the spell reaches
Can be looted on the ground by the foot of an underground golden tree. It is located in a cave path to the base of the Rauh Ruins, north-northeast of the Moorth Ruins in Scadu Atlus.
Name: Heal from Afar
Effect: Greatly heals HP for distant allies the spell reaches
How to get: Can be looted on the ground by the foot of an underground golden tree. It is located in a cave path to the base of the Rauh Ruins, north-northeast of the Moorth Ruins in Scadu Atlus.
Aspects of the Crucible: Thorns
Creates a mass of bristling thorns on back to scour the area
Dropped by the Golden Hippopotamus by going up the elevator in the Shadow Keep Main Gate.
Name: Aspects of the Crucible: Thorns
Effect: Creates a mass of bristling thorns on back to scour the area
How to get: Dropped by the Golden Hippopotamus by going up the elevator in the Shadow Keep Main Gate.
Aspects of the Crucible: Bloom
Creates a miranda flower on chest to summon rain of light
Can be found on a corpse near the Giant Miranda Sprout in the upper portions of Rauh Ruins. Starting at the "Rauh Ancient Ruins, East" site of grace, cross the bridge to the southeast. As soon as you get to the end of the bridge, but before going up the steps, turn north and keep going until you get to a gap that can be double jumped with torrent. The incantation is on the other side.
Name: Aspects of the Crucible: Bloom
Effect: Creates a miranda flower on chest to summon rain of light
How to get: Can be found on a corpse near the Giant Miranda Sprout in the upper portions of Rauh Ruins. Starting at the "Rauh Ancient Ruins, East" site of grace, cross the bridge to the southeast. As soon as you get to the end of the bridge, but before going up the steps, turn north and keep going until you get to a gap that can be double jumped with torrent. The incantation is on the other side.
Minor Erdtree
Continuously heals allies in the area
Shaman Village: Found in the middle of the glowing field of flowers.
Name: Minor Erdtree
Effect: Continuously heals allies in the area
How to get: Shaman Village: Found in the middle of the glowing field of flowers.
Land of Shadow
Fires a hail of golden projectiles toward foes
Can be selected as one of the possible rewards when trading Remembrance of the Shadow Sunflower with Enia at the Roundtable Hold.
Name: Land of Shadow
Effect: Fires a hail of golden projectiles toward foes
How to get: Can be selected as one of the possible rewards when trading Remembrance of the Shadow Sunflower with Enia at the Roundtable Hold.
Wrath from Afar
Fires a golden shockwave that knocks back foes
Take the elevator at the Storehouse, Loft site of grace in Shadow Keep. Once you are on the upper level, turn left, and turn left again. As soon as you can turn right. Beware of the bat hanging from the ceiling. Reach the other side, and take the ladder up. Turn left and move towards the area in which there is a giant gear (the one that does not have a bat on it), once you are aligned fall down to find the spell behind the column.
Name: Wrath from Afar
Effect: Fires a golden shockwave that knocks back foes
How to get: Take the elevator at the Storehouse, Loft site of grace in Shadow Keep. Once you are on the upper level, turn left, and turn left again. As soon as you can turn right. Beware of the bat hanging from the ceiling. Reach the other side, and take the ladder up. Turn left and move towards the area in which there is a giant gear (the one that does not have a bat on it), once you are aligned fall down to find the spell behind the column.
Light of Miquella
Annihilates foes with a pillar of light
Trade Remembrance of a God and a Lord with Enia at Roundtable Hold.
Name: Light of Miquella
Effect: Annihilates foes with a pillar of light
How to get: Trade Remembrance of a God and a Lord with Enia at Roundtable Hold.
Multilayered Ring of Light
Fires a multilayered golden ring of light that continuously inflicts damage
Rewarded on defeating the spirit Misbegotten Crusader in the Stone Coffin Fissure.
Name: Multilayered Ring of Light
Effect: Fires a multilayered golden ring of light that continuously inflicts damage
How to get: Rewarded on defeating the spirit Misbegotten Crusader in the Stone Coffin Fissure.
Roar of Rugalea
Channels great red bear to emit a furious roar
Dropped by Rugalea the Great Red Bear, located northwest of the "Ravine North" Site of Grace, in the wooded area with many Runebears on Rauh Base.
Name: Roar of Rugalea
Effect: Channels great red bear to emit a furious roar
How to get: Dropped by Rugalea the Great Red Bear, located northwest of the "Ravine North" Site of Grace, in the wooded area with many Runebears on Rauh Base.
Knight's Lightning Spear
Hurls lightning spear while firing additional spears from ancient dragon crests
Scorpion River Catacombs: In the big hall with the second set of eyes that inflict deathblight upon you (the one after a ladder), at the end of the bridge, there is a ledge on the right side which lets you cross to the other side. Run across the ledge while hugging the wall and then go inside the opening behind the set of eyes. You can find the incantation in the room directly in front of you.
Name: Knight's Lightning Spear
Effect: Hurls lightning spear while firing additional spears from ancient dragon crests
How to get: Scorpion River Catacombs: In the big hall with the second set of eyes that inflict deathblight upon you (the one after a ladder), at the end of the bridge, there is a ledge on the right side which lets you cross to the other side. Run across the ledge while hugging the wall and then go inside the opening behind the set of eyes. You can find the incantation in the room directly in front of you.
Dragonbolt of Florissax
Calls down red lightning to bolster self and nearby allies
Received from Dragon Communion Priestess after giving her Thiollier's Concoction and progressing her questline.
Name: Dragonbolt of Florissax
Effect: Calls down red lightning to bolster self and nearby allies
How to get: Received from Dragon Communion Priestess after giving her Thiollier's Concoction and progressing her questline.
Electrocharge
Calls down lightning to charge body with electricity
In the Fog Rift Catacombs after the second lift down. Past the stake of Marika. In the room with the giant spike ceiling. In the second alcove on the left is a drop down take it. Take a left, when you're in the room take another left through the short hallway there's two mages and the electrocharge spell on a corpse.
Name: Electrocharge
Effect: Calls down lightning to charge body with electricity
How to get: In the Fog Rift Catacombs after the second lift down. Past the stake of Marika. In the room with the giant spike ceiling. In the second alcove on the left is a drop down take it. Take a left, when you're in the room take another left through the short hallway there's two mages and the electrocharge spell on a corpse.
Bayle's Tyranny
Channels dread dragon to roar with a heatwave blast
Heart of Bayle can be used to at the Grand Altar of Dragon Communion to trade for Bayle's Flame Lightning or Bayle's Tyranny.
Name: Bayle's Tyranny
Effect: Channels dread dragon to roar with a heatwave blast
How to get: Heart of Bayle can be used to at the Grand Altar of Dragon Communion to trade for Bayle's Flame Lightning or Bayle's Tyranny.

Channels dread dragon to strike with flame-lightning-infused talon bone
Heart of Bayle can be used to at the Grand Altar of Dragon Communion to trade for Bayle's Flame Lightning or Bayle's Tyranny.
Name: Bayle's Flame Lightning
Effect: Channels dread dragon to strike with flame-lightning-infused talon bone
How to get: Heart of Bayle can be used to at the Grand Altar of Dragon Communion to trade for Bayle's Flame Lightning or Bayle's Tyranny.
Ghostflame Breath
Spews ghostflame breath from above
3x Dragon Heart can be used to at the Grand Altar of Dragon Communion to trade for this spell.
Name: Ghostflame Breath
Effect: Spews ghostflame breath from above
How to get: 3x Dragon Heart can be used to at the Grand Altar of Dragon Communion to trade for this spell.

Summons countless butterflies to scatter rot

Effect: Summons countless butterflies to scatter rot
How to get: Trade Remembrance of the Saint of the Bud with Enia at the Roundtable Hold.
Pest-Thread Spears
Secrete sticky threads and twist them into two frontward flying spears
From the Church of the Bud, Main Enterance grace, go North back into the cave and down the stairs, then take a right or left (it doesn't matter) and head behind the stairs, the incantation will be directly behind, guarded by one enemy.
Name: Pest-Thread Spears
Effect: Secrete sticky threads and twist them into two frontward flying spears
How to get: From the Church of the Bud, Main Enterance grace, go North back into the cave and down the stairs, then take a right or left (it doesn't matter) and head behind the stairs, the incantation will be directly behind, guarded by one enemy.

Divine Beast Tornado
Summons a storm that launches a tornado forward
Ancient Ruins of Rauh: This incantations drops from the Divine Beast Dancing Lion found northeast from the "Temple Town Ruins" Site of Grace.

Effect: Summons a storm that launches a tornado forward
How to get: Ancient Ruins of Rauh: This incantations drops from the Divine Beast Dancing Lion found northeast from the "Temple Town Ruins" Site of Grace.
Divine Bird Feathers
Spreads arms like wings and releases a flurry of feathers
Ancient Ruins of Rauh. Can be found the corpse in the middle of the lake. From Church of the Bud, Main Entrance site of grace, head north into the building, east down the central stairway and then south to outside. Go past the gazebo and look at the corpse in the middle of the water. Go towards it and then pick up the Divine Bird Feathers.
Name: Divine Bird Feathers
Effect: Spreads arms like wings and releases a flurry of feathers
How to get: Ancient Ruins of Rauh. Can be found the corpse in the middle of the lake. From Church of the Bud, Main Entrance site of grace, head north into the building, east down the central stairway and then south to outside. Go past the gazebo and look at the corpse in the middle of the water. Go towards it and then pick up the Divine Bird Feathers.
Fire Serpent
Launches a flame with a serpentine coil
Shadow Keep: From the "Storehouse, Backsection" site of grace, climb up the very long ladder, pass the enemies, and move forward past the book reading spirits until you reach the balcony. You will find the item there.
Name: Fire Serpent
Effect: Launches a flame with a serpentine coil
How to get: Shadow Keep: From the "Storehouse, Backsection" site of grace, climb up the very long ladder, pass the enemies, and move forward past the book reading spirits until you reach the balcony. You will find the item there.
Rain of Fire
Pelts foe with rain of fire from above
From the West Rampart Site of Grace, take the bridge all the way. Use Torrent to avoid being trapped in the Rain of Fire. Defeat the Fire Knight at the end to obtain this and Salza's Hood.
Name: Rain of Fire
Effect: Pelts foe with rain of fire from above
How to get: From the West Rampart Site of Grace, take the bridge all the way. Use Torrent to avoid being trapped in the Rain of Fire. Defeat the Fire Knight at the end to obtain this and Salza's Hood.

Effect: Shapes Messmer's flame into a giant orb that soars at foe

Watchful Spirit
Summons a guardian spirit above the caster's head
Given by Hornsent Grandam after defeating the Divine Beast Dancing Lion. Talk to her twice with the Divine Beast Head equipped, to receive this incantation.

Effect: Summons a guardian spirit above the caster's head
How to get: Given by Hornsent Grandam after defeating the Divine Beast Dancing Lion. Talk to her twice with the Divine Beast Head equipped, to receive this incantation.
Golden Arcs
Releases a procession of golden arcs with a swing of the arm
Head southeast of Moorth Ruins. From the Shattered Stone Talisman chest, drop down to the nearest platform and continue descending until you reach the ground where three Inquisitors are situated. Defeat them and enter the small building nearby to find this item inside a chest.
Name: Golden Arcs
Effect: Releases a procession of golden arcs with a swing of the arm
How to get: Head southeast of Moorth Ruins. From the Shattered Stone Talisman chest, drop down to the nearest platform and continue descending until you reach the ground where three Inquisitors are situated. Defeat them and enter the small building nearby to find this item inside a chest.
Giant Golden Arc
Releases a giant golden arc with a swing of the arm
Obtained by looting a chest in the Ruins of Unte. The chest is inside a building in a flower area that is accessible after using a Hefty Furnace Pot and throwing it at the head of the deactivated Furnace Golem that blocks the entrance.
Name: Giant Golden Arc
Effect: Releases a giant golden arc with a swing of the arm
How to get: Obtained by looting a chest in the Ruins of Unte. The chest is inside a building in a flower area that is accessible after using a Hefty Furnace Pot and throwing it at the head of the deactivated Furnace Golem that blocks the entrance.
Spira
Summons a spiral of light that erupts at the enemy's feet
Enir-Ilim: From First Rise Grace on a raised platform accessible from using tree branches. It would be on a small altar that is directly in front of statue.
Name: Spira
Effect: Summons a spiral of light that erupts at the enemy's feet
How to get: Enir-Ilim: From First Rise Grace on a raised platform accessible from using tree branches. It would be on a small altar that is directly in front of statue.
Stamp (Upward Cut)
Brace armament and step into a low stance that prevents recoil from most enemy attacks. Follow up with a strong attack for an upward strike.
Sold by Bernahl in the Warmaster's Shack in Stormhill, Limgrave.
Name: Stamp (Upward Cut)
Description: Brace armament and step into a low stance that prevents recoil from most enemy attacks. Follow up with a strong attack for an upward strike.
Location: Sold by Bernahl in the Warmaster's Shack in Stormhill, Limgrave.
Stamp (Sweep)
Brace armament and step into a low stance that prevents recoil from most enemy attacks. Follow up with a strong attack for a sweeping strike.
Dropped by an invisible scarab on the beach east of Stormfoot Catacombs, in west Limgrave.
Name: Stamp (Sweep)
Description: Brace armament and step into a low stance that prevents recoil from most enemy attacks. Follow up with a strong attack for a sweeping strike.
Location: Dropped by an invisible scarab on the beach east of Stormfoot Catacombs, in west Limgrave.
Wild Strikes
Swing armaments with wild abandon. Hold to continue swinging. Can be followed up with a normal or strong attack.
Dropped by a scarab on the path north of the Castleward Tunnel site of grace, in northwest Limgrave.

Description: Swing armaments with wild abandon. Hold to continue swinging. Can be followed up with a normal or strong attack.

Skill of the Redmanes, who fought alongside General Radahn. Somersault forwards, striking foes with armament.

Reinforce weapon with earth.

Description: Reinforce weapon with earth.
Location: Dropped by a scarab west of the Impassable Greatbridge site of grace, in south Caelid.
Kick
Push an enemy back with a high kick. Effective against enemies who are guarding, and can break a foe's stance. Sometimes a simple tool is the most effective.
Sold by Bernahl in the Warmaster's Shack in Stormhill, Limgrave.

Description: Push an enemy back with a high kick. Effective against enemies who are guarding, and can break a foe's stance. Sometimes a simple tool is the most effective.
Location: Sold by Bernahl in the Warmaster's Shack in Stormhill, Limgrave.
Endure
Assume an anchored stance to brace for incoming attacks, briefly boosting poise. Damage taken while using this skill is reduced.
Sold by Bernahl in the Warmaster's Shack in Stormhill, Limgrave.
Name: Endure
Description: Assume an anchored stance to brace for incoming attacks, briefly boosting poise. Damage taken while using this skill is reduced.
Location: Sold by Bernahl in the Warmaster's Shack in Stormhill, Limgrave.
Ground Slam
Jump up high into the air and crash down on the ground ahead. The resulting pratfall sends a powerful shockwave in all directions.
Dropped by a scarab on a small hill, southwest of the Minor Erdtree in the Mistwood, in east Limgrave.

Earthshaker
Thrust armament into the ground, then gather strength to unleash an earth-shaking shockwave. Follow up with a strong attack to swing the armament in a sweeping strike.
Dropped by a stationary invisible scarab, at the road junction southwest of the Altus Highway Junction site of grace in south Altus Plateau.
Name: Earthshaker
Description: Thrust armament into the ground, then gather strength to unleash an earth-shaking shockwave. Follow up with a strong attack to swing the armament in a sweeping strike.
Location: Dropped by a stationary invisible scarab, at the road junction southwest of the Altus Highway Junction site of grace in south Altus Plateau.
Hoarah Loux's Earthshaker
Slam both hands onto the ground to violently shake the earth and unleash a shockwave. Follow up with an additional input to slam the ground again.
Exchanged for the Remembrance of Hoarah Loux at the Roundtable Hold.
Name: Hoarah Loux's Earthshaker
Description: Slam both hands onto the ground to violently shake the earth and unleash a shockwave. Follow up with an additional input to slam the ground again.
Location: Exchanged for the Remembrance of Hoarah Loux at the Roundtable Hold.

Give a war cry to rally the spirit and increase attack power. While active, strong attacks change to charging attacks.

Description: Give a war cry to rally the spirit and increase attack power. While active, strong attacks change to charging attacks.

Description: Increase attack power. Strong attacks turn into savage combo attacks.

Declare your presence with a boastful roar. Raises attack power, defense, and stamina recovery speed.
